bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign erroneous writing of lin lu 淋露 , dripping [like] dew drops

b) . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ji ni 薺苨：蠱毒腹痛，面目青黃，林露骨立 , “ Gu poison with abdominal pain; the face and eyes green-yellow; forest dew and bones visible under the skin”. The phrase 骨立 appears in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 four times; the writing 林露骨立 appears once, presumably as a scribal error.
